name: Technoland
description: TechnoLAND is a technology market established on the metaverse.TechnoLAND is a project where you can reach all electronic devices by shopping in the Metaverse. After the existence of this project,u will stop shopping from e-commerce sites and By navigating, experiencing and using crypto on the Metaverse, you will safely buy all your electronic needs from anywhere in the world.You can find all brands in TechnoLAND and without shipping fee. Our goal is to bring you the devices that will combine the metaverse and the real world with one click, when the whole world is included in the metaverse.
